CustomField.description: Defaults to CUSTOM_OBJECTS. This controls the default location where LogEntryEvent__e records are stored - when null, LogEntryEvent__e records will not be stored.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defaults to CUSTOM_OBJECTS. This controls the default location where LogEntryEvent__e records are stored - when null, LogEntryEvent__e records will not be stored.
CustomField.label: Platform Event Storage Location
